about:
I am a recent MS Computer Science from Louisiana Tech University with a cumulative GPA for 4.0.

I have over 6 years of experience in software product development and research projects involving myself in a multitude of projects related to the development of backend API, data visualization, and data analytics pipeline.

Professionally I have worked at startups as well as large organizations and have hands-on experience with Agile workflow in the project lifecycle.

I am actively looking for a challenging opportunity in a growth-oriented organization where my abilities and knowledge will be optimally utilized. ðŸ˜€

help:
• path - display current directory
  • cat FILENAME - display FILENAME in window
  • cd DIRECTORY - move into DIRECTORY or just cd to return to root
  • ls - show files in current directory
  • history - see your command history
  • clear - clear current window
